name: Share Extras
tagline: A collection of easy-to-install add-ons for Alfresco Share, providing custom dashlets, document actions and more
body:
### Dashlets

[Tag Cloud Dashlet](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/TagCloudDashlet) | [Site Blog Dashlet](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/SiteBlogDashlet) | [Site Poll Dashlet](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/SitePollDashlet) | [Site Geotagged Content Dashlet](geo-views/) | [Twitter Dashlets](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/TwitterDashlets) | [BBC Weather Dashlet](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/BBCWeatherDashlet) | [Notice Dashlet](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/NoticeDashlet) | [Google Site News Dashlet](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/GoogleSiteNewsDashlet) | [Flickr Dashlets](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/FlickrDashlets) | [Train Times Dashlet](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/TrainTimesDashlet) | [iCal Feed Dashlet](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/iCalFeedDashlet) | [Document Viewer Dashlet](media-viewers/) | [My Expired Content](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/ContentExpiration) | [Audit Dashlet](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/SampleAuditDashlet) | [SurveyMonkey Dashlet](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/SurveyMonkeyDashlet )

### Themes

[Red Theme](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/RedTheme)

### Document Library Actions

[Backup Action](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/BackupAction ) | [Execute Script Action](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/ExecuteScriptAction) | [Geotag Action](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/DocumentGeographicDetails)

### Admin Console Tools

[Node Browser Component](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/NodeBrowser) | [JavaScript Console](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/JavascriptConsole) | [Create Bulk Users](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/CreateBulkUsers)

### Form Configurations and Extensions

[Sample Data Lists](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/DataLists) | [CKEditor Form Control](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/CKEditorFormControl)

### Page Components and Component Extensions

[Media Viewers](media-viewers/) | [Wiki Rich Content Extensions](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/WikiRichContent) | [Document Geographic Details Component](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/DocumentGeographicDetails) | [Google Analytics Tracking](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/GoogleAnalyticsTracking)

### Pages

[Content Expiration](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/ContentExpiration) | [Reset Password Dialog](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/ResetPasswordDialog)

All add-ons should work with version 3.3 and 3.4 of Alfresco Share, except where noted.

Download/Install
----------------

Each add-on is available as a separate JAR or AMP file for [easy installation](http://blogs.alfresco.com/wp/kevinr/2010/01/28/alfresco-share-33-extensions-and-springsurf/). To download the latest release of an add-on, see the [Downloads](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/downloads/list) section.

You can also build the add-ons from source using [Ant](http://ant.apache.org/).

Sample Projects
---------------

A Sample Project is provided as a basic example of how to organise your own projects, including Eclipse configuration and an Ant build script.

Contribute
----------

You can help us build up an even bigger set of add-ons for Share by [contributing](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/wiki/ContributionProcess) your own extensions, or even just ideas for suitable extensions by [filing an issue](http://code.google.com/p/share-extras/issues/entry).

To discuss development of Share Extras extensions, use the [Development Group](http://groups.google.com/group/share-extras-devel).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
